Package pl.bristleback.server.bristle.serialization.system.json.extractor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FormattingValueSerializer<T>
    Extended ValueSerializer interface, implementations should be able to handle format property of the Bind, Serialize and Property annotations.
    ValueSerializer<T>
    Implementations of this interface should be capable of converting data stored as json into some specified Java objects and from Java objects into json form.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseNumberFormattingValueSerializer<T extends Number>
    Base class for built in number formatting serializers, containing utility methods for serializers internal usage.
    BaseRawValueSerializer<T>
    This is a convenient class for value serializers that use simple json value (either stored as number, String or boolean).
